subject: [STATUS] svn-bzr mirrors updating every 15 minutes now
body:
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

Folks,

I increased the frequency of the mirrors from twice an hour
to 4 times an hour.  For reference, the anonymous svn mirror
is updated every 5 minutes.





cheers, jerry
=====================================================================

Centeris                         -----------  http://www.centeris.com
